New Records: Christian Eriksen set a record with his 133rd international appearance for Denmark
Key Match Events: Denmark and Serbia had goals disallowed; Denmark had substantial possession; Serbia's lack of chances led to their exit
Pre-Game Insights: Kasper Schmeichel expressed confidence ahead of the knockout stage; Christian Eriksen was Denmark's key attacking threat
Post-Match Reflections: Aleksandar Mitrovic expressed frustration at missed opportunities; Serbia manager Dragan Stojkovic made tactical changes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Allianz Arena; attendance was 64,288; Denmark advanced to the knockout stage
